snippet: WOLFF-- Michael. 1940-2016. We mourn the loss of Michael Wolff who passed away peacefully on Sunday, February 7, 2016. Mike was a friend and mentor to many. His enthusiasm for life was contagious. Mike is survived by his devoted wife, Maria, his loving sister, Lois Hoffman, his daughters and sons-in-law, Jennifer (Jeff) Finnerty and Allison (Wes) Arnett and five adoring grandchildren. Services will be held Thursday, February 11 from 11am-1pm at John Krtil Funeral Home, 1297 First Avenue, 70th Street. The family will accept visitors immediately following at Le Triomphe, 245 E. 58th Street, third floor. 1/3
